aboutPage.developerCredit: This application was designed and developed by <1>Rachit Sharma</1> with the aim of providing comprehensive information about the Patna Metro.
aboutPage.developerContribution: This project is a labor of love, developed over 1.5 months to empower the people of Patna with a 100% free and user-friendly metro navigation tool. My goal is to anticipate the future needs of commuters, ensuring a smooth and effortless travel experience once all stations are live.
aboutPage.title: About Patna Metro
aboutPage.subtitle: Transforming Patna's Urban Mobility with Modern Rapid Transit
aboutPage.overviewPara1: Patna Metro is a ₹13,365 crore rapid transit system under construction in Patna, Bihar. Approved in 2018, it's set to revolutionize urban transportation in Bihar's capital city.
aboutPage.projectBackgroundPara1: The project was conceived to address Patna's growing traffic congestion and pollution problems. With a population exceeding 3 million and rapid urbanization, the need for efficient mass transit became critical.
aboutPage.projectBackgroundPara2: The foundation stone was laid by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on February 17, 2019, marking Bihar's entry into the metro rail network era.
blueLineDetails: Length: 16.5 km (14.5 km elevated, 2 km underground)
Route: Patna Junction to Mithapur Bus Stand
Key Stations: Patna Junction, Raj Bhavan, Vidhan Sabha, PMCH
redLineDetails: Route: Patna Airport to Patna Railway Station
Key Stations: Patna Airport, Gandhi Maidan, Patna Sahib
aboutPage.implementationFundingPara1: The project is being implemented by the Patna Metro Rail Corporation (PMRC), a 50:50 joint venture between the Government of India and Government of Bihar. The funding pattern follows the standard metro rail policy with equal equity participation from both governments.
aboutPage.implementationFundingPara2: Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA) is providing loan assistance for the project, covering about 60% of the total project cost.

hero.title: PATNA METRO
hero.description: Under the visionary leadership of Hon’ble Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Hon’ble Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, Patna Metro — Bihar’s first rapid transit system — is set to transform the city’s connectivity by seamlessly connecting North and South Patna with modern infrastructure, world-class facilities, and a smarter, faster commute.
hero.ticker: • PATNA METRO UPDATE: Operations on the priority corridor (Malahi Pakri to ISBT) with 5 stations are scheduled to begin by August 15, 2025. Stay safe! For emergencies, contact Police: 112 or Fire: 101. The metro will offer free WiFi at all stations. •

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our Patna Metro Bot. We do not collect or store any personal data.
privacyPolicy.section1Text: We do not collect any personal information about you, such as your name, phone number, or email ID. When you use our bot, we only process your conversation to provide you with the correct metro route and fare. This information is used solely for route-finding purposes and is not stored anywhere.
privacyPolicy.section2Title: 2. How Do We Use Your Information?
privacyPolicy.section2Text: We use your conversation data only for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.section2List1: To provide you with the best metro route from one station to another.
privacyPolicy.section2List2: To give you an estimated travel time and fare.
privacyPolicy.section2List3: To answer your questions and assist you.
privacyPolicy.section2Text2: This information is not used for any marketing or advertising purposes.
privacyPolicy.section3Title: 3. How Do We Protect Your Information?
privacyPolicy.section3Text: We take all necessary steps to keep your data secure. Since we do not store any personal information, the security of your data is ensured. Our bot processes your conversation only while you are using it, and the data is deleted immediately afterward.
privacyPolicy.section4Text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Whenever we make a change, we will post the new policy on this page. We encourage you to review this page periodically.
